name: Inazuma Eleven 3: Lightning Bolt
description:
Inazuma Eleven 3: Lightning Bolt is a sports-arcade game developed by Level 5. It was originally released in 2013. Nintendo published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Inazuma Eleven 3: Lightning Bolt is available on Nintendo 3DS.
Akihiro Hino produced the game. It was directed by Takehiro Fujii. Natsumi Kameoka and Yasunori Mitsuda scored the game.
